column4: guys i wanna install GTK+ and i already installed all the pre-requirements and so , and the configure prefix=/home/abed/Desktop/installed but when i try to configure the GTK i have to do it with this parameter --without-libjasper and when i try make command i got this http://pastebin.com/m1d481f0f
